twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.description: Protect your account with an additional security factor. When logging in, you'll need a code from your authenticator app in addition to your password.
twoFactor.activeInfo: Two-factor authentication is enabled for your account.
twoFactor.requiredByAdmin: Two-factor authentication is required for all users and cannot be disabled.
twoFactor.requiredWarning: The administrator has made two-factor authentication mandatory for all users.

verify.title: Two-Factor Authentication
verify.subtitle: Signing in as {{username}}
verify.codeHint: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app or use a backup code.
verify.backupHint: You can also use one of your backup codes.

setup.title: Set up 2FA
setup.required: Two-factor authentication must be set up before you can continue.
setup.requiredDescription: Your administrator has made two-factor authentication mandatory for all users. Please set it up now.
setup.scanInstructions: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
setup.manualDescription: If you can't scan the QR code, enter this key manually in your app:
setup.verifyDescription: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app to complete setup.

disable.title: Disable 2FA
disable.warning: Disabling two-factor authentication will make your account less secure.

backupCodes.title: Backup Codes
backupCodes.regenerateWarning: Your current backup codes will be invalidated. Make sure to save the new codes securely.
backupCodes.lowWarning: You have only a few backup codes remaining. Consider regenerating new codes.
backupCodes.successDescription: Your account is now protected with two-factor authentication.
backupCodes.saveDescription: You can only see these codes once. Keep them safe - you'll need them if you lose access to your authenticator app.
backupCodes.important1: Each code can only be used once.
backupCodes.important2: Store these codes in a safe place (e.g., password manager).
backupCodes.important3: Don't share these codes with anyone.
backupCodes.important4: You can regenerate new codes at any time (old ones will be invalidated).

errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
errors.setupExpired: Setup has expired. Please start the process again.
errors.cannotDisable: Two-factor authentication cannot be disabled because it has been made mandatory by the administrator.

step1.title: Install App
step1.description: Download an authenticator app like Google Authenticator or Authy on your smartphone.

step2.title: Enter Code
step2.description: Each time you sign in, enter the 6-digit code from the app.
